dofi.name: Smart Robot for Kids
dofi.info: Our AI-Powered Smart Robot is an interactive companion designed to enhance children's learning, creativity, and emotional development. With voice recognition, movement, educational games, and video calling, this robot makes learning fun while fostering cognitive growth.
dofi.description: This intelligent robot adapts to each child’s learning pace, offering personalized education through storytelling, math exercises, and language learning (Voscreen & Duolingo-style). Its expressive face and motion abilities make interactions lifelike, while built-in games (spelling, hide-and-seek, tic-tac-toe) ensure engagement. Parents can stay connected via video calls and monitor playtime through the companion app. Perfect for kids who love technology and interactive learning!

features.name: AI-powered robot with a human-like touch
Enhanced encryption ensures safety, Parental control
Interactive robot that teaches and listens
Loaded with learning apps and games
DreamBuddy – AI-guided dream creator that inspires imagination and improves sleep

dofi-pro.name: Smart Robot for Daun Kids
dofi-pro.info: Specially designed for children with developmental differences (such as Down syndrome), this adaptive smart robot provides gentle, interactive learning with simplified commands, sensory-friendly games, and emotional support features.
dofi-pro.description: The Daun Kids Smart Robot focuses on inclusive learning, helping children strengthen communication, motor skills, and cognitive abilities in a fun, stress-free way. This robot encourages confidence and independence while keeping parents connected through video calls and progress tracking. A perfect companion for special needs education & joyful play!

features.name: Simplified voice commands for easy interaction
Emotion-recognition to respond to a child’s mood
Parental control app for safe, guided play

dofi-bag.name: Dofi’s Bag
dofi-bag.info: A durable, kid-friendly bag to carry and protect your smart robot.
dofi-bag.description: Keep your robot safe and portable with this lightweight, shock-resistant bag. Designed for easy travel. Perfect for home, school, or trips!

features.name: Padded interior to prevent bumps and scratches
Pocket for accessories (charging cable, cards, etc.)
